alert.note: Alert for Cleveland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 18 at 11:54AM CST until January 18 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL CLEVELAND...NORTHERN CALHOUN...SOUTHEASTERN DALLAS AND NORTHEASTERN OUACHITA COUNTIES... At 1154 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Sparkman, or 17 miles west of Fordyce, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Princeton... Tulip... Pine Grove... Ivan... Ouachita... Holly Springs... Bunn... Ramsey... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
